examples: There is a fire alarm going off at Zentralküche.
There is a power outage at Klinik für Radiologie - Medizinphysik, MRDAC.
There is a radiation leak at Klinik für Strahlenheilkunde.
An infectious disease outbreak was identified at Institut für Infektionsprävention und Krankenhaushygiene.
There is a big medical conference being held at Institute for Disease Modeling and Targeted Science (IMITATE).
There is a funeral service being held at Lutherkirche.
There is equipment malfunction at Klinik für Augenheilkunde, Klinik für Hals-, Nasen- und Ohrenheilkunde, Klinik für Lungenheilkunde.
There is an employee protest at Personalrat.
There is a simulation exercise to test emergency response going on at Institute for Disease Modeling and Targeted Science (IMITATE).
A government official is visiting the  Tumorzentrum Freiburg CCCF (Verwaltung).
